info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 6:40PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Fulton, southeastern Herkimer and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 640 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. Johnsville, or 7 miles southeast of Little Falls, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Falls, St. Johnsville, Ingham Mills, Crum Creek, Garlock Corners, Charlesworth Corners, Starkville, Kringsbush, Fink Basin, Mindenville, Davys Corners, Indian Castle, Ingham Mills Station, Newville, West Saint Johnsville, Fordsbush, Wrights Corners, Deck, Smith Corners and Saint Johnsville. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 29A. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
